summary: Texture replacer of galaxy, masser and secunda.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Nightsky
Author: SilverCandy (a.k.a Silver)
Translator and uploader: homosaikou [/size]
[size=4][font=微软雅黑][color=#ff0000][size=2][color=#ff0000][b][color=#ffffff]
[/color][/b][/color][/size][/color][/font][/size]I got interested in science fiction when I was a kid.
Then I grew up, playing computer games comes to be my another hobby.
Why not combining them together? It should be interesting! 
At first, I searched mod sites for some galaxy textures. But unfortunately, they don't satisfy me.
They are certainly beautiful. However... you know, I can feel that they are a bit far from the PERFECT in my mind.
Then, I started to make mods myself.
I really love the scene of  giant planets appearing in sci-fi movies. I am trying to let them re-appear in Skyrim.
I hope you like them.[size=2]
The pics below compare good tweaks and bad tweaks to the textures of galaxy and masser.
(description not finished. Check picture section.)[/size]
[size=4]
What this mod contains:
[/size][list]
[*][size=4] 5 kinds of galaxy, with roughly 4K resolution (3328*2048)[/size]
[/list][list]
[*][size=4] 3 kinds of masser, with 2K resolution[/size]
[*][size=4] 1 kind of secunda[/size]
[*][size=4] Optional file: Size Adjustment for masser and secunda.[/size]
[/list]
[size=2]*If you want to keep your game stable, it is highly recommended to keep the same esp name.
Size Adjustment contains esp files with different names, so you have to modify the name of the size you choose and save them in this way:
"Masser Size x3.0.esp" should be changed into "Masser Size.esp" ( Capitalize or not doesn't matter.)
"Secunda Size x0.7.esp" should be changed into "Secunda Size.esp"
when you are going to change the size, unzip the package and rename the esp you choose and overwrite the current file.[color=#ff0000][size=4][color=#ffffff][size=2]
[/size]
[color=#ff0000][color=#ffffff]Compatibility[/color]
[/color]Conflict with other galaxy, masser or secunda replacer mods.[/color][/size][/color][/size]
author: Silver
